review: Yeah starbound... aah well... it was a fun game for 5 minutesI honestly don't see much of this game sure it has a sweet trailer but over all it was a bit dry.I've played alot of survival games and the means minecraft... I'm sorry I'm a discraise D;but this is the stuff that really lacked for me:-No choice in ship custimization yeah sure you can put a fue paintings or whatevers in there but you get the picture from the start you know no choice in your ships begining look. >:|-And honestly the story lacked ALOT!I really would'nt play this game until its almost completely all bug fixed and some work added. dislike 4/10

review: Aaah... don't you just love to sit back and enjoy a quality dungeon crawler? Well this game has everything from a gut renching intro, a never ending lust for battle! And to top it off the feeling of loneliness... This game is your bucket of depression... In a good way though. I rate his game 11/10. WARNING: Mac users should avoid this game due to unbearable lag!
